eventParts.text: Oh, hello. I didn’t see you there.
Oh, I’m just studying the emotional balance in this area to figure out what will happen once the loneliness disaster hits.
Yes! I’ve lived in Windy Peaks my whole life, so I won’t be too affected, but I worry about other birds.
If I suddenly felt really lonely I wouldn’t know what to do. I’m not sure I could go on working as a trader.
Exactly! The emotional balance in the world is going to become upset. I’m trying to figure out if there’s something we can do to prepare.
Say, are you guys heading closer to vulture territory? For conclusive results on the emotional balance I need to do some measurements there as well.
We are! Some vultures stole all our seeds and we’re trying to get them back. You’re welcome to come with us if you want!
Thank you! I think I’ll take you up on that offer!
